entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
